most-popular.title: Most Popular Activities
most-popular.description: Your next adventure may be closer than you think. Discover activities.

lux-activities.title: Luxury Activities
lux-activities.description: Experience the best of Dubai's luxury activities.

water-activities.title: Water Activities
water-activities.description: Experience the best of Dubai's water activities.

boxes.title: Discover the Event
boxes.description: Easily choose from dozens of events that interest you. Each event comes with detailed descriptions, visuals, and user reviews ready for you.

boxes.title: Make Your Reservation
boxes.description: Securely reserve your event with just a few clicks. Create your plans freely with flexible cancellation options and instant confirmation.

boxes.title: Enjoy the Experience
boxes.description: When the event day arrives, focus only on your enjoyment. The entire organization will have been thought out for you.
